vulnerability.description: App com.akop.bach puts data (retrieved from an Explicit Intent (Component = AccountSettings)) on an unsafe sink (DATABASE_INFORMATION) in one of its components (com.akop.bach.activity.playstation.AccountSettings). A malicious app can send a sensitive data from this channel.

App com.akop.bach puts data (retrieved from an Explicit Intent (Component = AccountSettings)) on an unsafe sink (DATABASE_INFORMATION) in one of its components (com.akop.bach.activity.xboxlive.AccountSettings). A malicious app can send a sensitive data from this channel.

App com.akop.bach puts data (retrieved from an Explicit Intent (Component = FriendSummary)) on an unsafe sink (LOG) in one of its components (com.akop.bach.activity.xboxlive.FriendSummary). A malicious app can send a sensitive data from this channel.

App com.doomy.torch puts data (retrieved from an Explicit Intent (Component = WidgetActivity)) on an unsafe sink (DATABASE_INFORMATION) in one of its components (com.doomy.torch.WidgetActivity). A malicious app can send a sensitive data from this channel.

App fr.xgouchet.texteditor puts data (retrieved from an Explicit Intent (Component = TedActivity)) on an unsafe sink (LOG) in one of its components (fr.xgouchet.texteditor.TedActivity). A malicious app can send a sensitive data from this channel.

App fr.xgouchet.texteditor puts data (retrieved from an Explicit Intent (Component = TedWidgetConfigActivity)) on an unsafe sink (DATABASE_INFORMATION) in one of its components (fr.xgouchet.texteditor.TedWidgetConfigActivity). A malicious app can send a sensitive data from this channel.
App null retrieves sensitive data (null) in one of its components (null), passes data to another component (null) via transitive intent sending, and finally puts this data on an unsafe sink (null)
